description.@en: Whatever side offers me the best deal is the one I take, but they’d better watch their back if they change their minds about my usefulness.

data.notes: Every Profession possesses a unique knack, an ability that no other Profession has access to. The Trait immediately follows the Profession’s description.

effect.@en: You do not have to make Skill Tests to masquerade as someone of a different Allegiance, fitting in without fail.
